website_summaries.verdict: This solid screen gives you an easy setup and comes in several sizes to meet your space requirements.
pros: Easy to take up and take down
Light and easy to set up
cons: While there are some models with adjustable legs, this one does not have the ability to adjust height

customer_reviews.title: The Optimus Prime of Movie Screens
customer_reviews.text: This screen is awesome. We bought it for our church's movie nights. It goes up and comes down quickly and easily, it reflects the image nicely, and the carrying case is great. A lot has been said about the creases in the screen in the reviews. I don't know how any portable screen wouldn't have creases if you are folding it up to carry around. If you are leaving it up in a permanent position, those creases should go away because the screen is pulled pretty lightly. I have not once noticed them once the movie starts going.
customer_reviews.author: D. Foley

customer_reviews.title: Portable, light, and great if you can't mount your screen on a ceiling
customer_reviews.text: I love this screen. It is light enough for me to drag it across the floor (somewhat awkward by myself, because it's a large, wobbly screen haha) and place it in front of my TV when I want to use it. Takes me a couple minutes to move it back against the wall on the side of my room when not in use. Easy to set up, and I like that it can be broken down and placed into the bag for on-the-go. I plan to also use this screen for outdoor parties with friends. Don't worry about creases in the screen. Give it a couple days, and they will smooth out.
customer_reviews.author: KcMsterpce

customer_reviews.title: This screen ROCKS! It's large, easily portable and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazingly versatile screen to project 4K either indoors or outdoors. I don't know how durable the vinyl is, but it sure is easy to put up and take down. Super sturdy aluminum frame as well. Really well designed. If you kick up the back stabilizers, leaving the one's in front down, you can push this giant screen directly up against a wall for more space and convenience. I've used it now a few times, at work and at home, and I can say with no reservation this is one of the best screens I've ever had, and I really love it when companies can demonstrate real ingenuity and execution to make a product both great... AND affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Surfjumper

customer_reviews.title: Wow, These are great Indoor Screens!
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing this for over 20years professionally and have worked with screens 10 times more expensive but I had to buy these in a pinch inside and they have worked awesome. BUT, I am uncertain that I would use them outside even with straps. Not sure if I would use them outside at all. Inside though they are great. They are low to the ground, so if they are too low, you need to buy the legs that extend.
customer_reviews.author: Truck Owner

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen!
customer_reviews.text: I was scouring the reviews in search of the best projector screen that was both affordable and easy to assemble. My brother suggested this screen since he had previously purchased the same one. It comes in a carry case that is durable and easily holds all of the parts. I was a little concerned about assembly when I first opened it, but it proved to be fairly simple! I was also concerned that the folding line from storing would show during screenings but they disappeared once completely assembled. I was pleasantly surprised at how nice this screen is, especially for the price! I look forward to using it for outdoor movie nights, and special events all year!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Butera

customer_reviews.title: I'm Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This screen far exceeded my expectations. I was expecting a flimsy frame with some material to cover it. This is actually a very nice screen that compares to others that cost a lot more. The material stretches to fit the frame, similar to "Fast Fold" screens from other manufacturers. Once it is on the frame, there are no wrinkles. The frame is fairly thick extruded aluminum and unfolds and locks very easily. Although I didn't need them, it comes with legs, some anchor stakes and even some rope to anchor it if you use it outside (otherwise it could blow away). It even comes with a nice soft sided carrying bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality with little details in the right places...
customer_reviews.text: I had a cheaper version of this type of product from another vendor - I sold it... Why? The Visual Apex is superior in quality and useability, even if it does cost a bit more. For example? Apex uses a slightly more "stretchy" screen material which is easier to snap onto the grommets. It also has the extra extension legs available (for an extra fee) making it far more useful when you travel to conference venues with variable height ceilings. If you do presentation and want to make a professional impression, a few extra dollars on these sorts of aesthetics is very worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: br

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 months use.
customer_reviews.text: Screen is great but the rest is a piece of crap. Both legs and the bottom of the frame bent then broke making it useless. Snapping the screen onto the frame is not fun at all. Bring a friend and a pair of vice grips to force it to fit. After assembly go see a therapist to get your fingers and palm fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H Christman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, but case damaged-twice.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 4th of July picnic and it set up pretty easy. I suggest using two people to set it up...easier that way. Once it was dark enough it's an awesome picture. My only complaint is that the soft carry case was torn at the stitching in two places. Does not reduce quality of the screen but it was a bummer to find damage right out of the box. I'll be gathering all my stuff in hopes of getting a new case for it. Follow-up...notified merchant of the torn stitching and they sent a replacement. Unfortunately it too was torn. Possibly a manufacturing problem.
customer_reviews.author: B Massey

customer_reviews.title: The other little thing is that the stakes are not very good. I picked up some heavy duty stakes at ...
customer_reviews.text: It is really a phenomenal screen. Anyone who says it's difficult to put together is an idiot... this thing could not be easier. It is such a piece of cake to erect the legs and snap the screen on. The ONLY slight critique that I have is that the legs bent a little bit when we had a strong wind. I quickly secured it down with some additional straps, but now I've got an ugly little bend in my otherwise pristine screen. The other little thing is that the stakes are not very good. I picked up some heavy duty stakes at Lowe's and used those instead and they work much better.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great projector screen
customer_reviews.text: The screen was initially tricky to set up but the frame was a breeze. The screen has snaps around the perimeter that attach to the frame and it took some muscle to stretch it out. It’s nice and smoothly stretched which makes for a better picture. We loosely staked it in the ground and it fell onto a bush the first night and I thought for sure it was permanently damaged but it smoothed itself out and was proven to be extremely resilient. Would definitely recommend! The picture included was taken after leaving it outside for two nights (and a little rain)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great screen. Super easy to setup and teardown
customer_reviews.text: Great screen. Super easy to setup and teardown. Looks superb. The only problem is that when you get it, it tends to have some creases. Customer service was impeccable and helped resolve my issue with 100% satisfaction. You can definitely buy this product with confidence that they will help you IF you have any defects. Important tip: keep the cardboard pieces that are included with it so you can use them when you refold and store away otherwise you may end up with additional little circular creases from the snaps.
customer_reviews.author: Tal9000

customer_reviews.title: This projection screen is a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: - The Visualapex 144 inch projection screen more than fulfilled my expectations. It is well thought out and includes a stand with tie downs, wall bracket, and an excellent carrying bag. - The screen was easy to assemble using the the sparse user manual. I recemmond viewing the online set-up video. - The 144 inch screen is large and may require two people to set it up. - The carrying bag had a tear when delivered. I called customer support and they responded courteously and efficiently and replaced the bag. - We showed a movie first time last night; family and friends enjoyed the LARGE sharp images on the screen. - This projection screen is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Ace J.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: Love this screen...although if your moving it in and out of storage or wherever its a little hard to button around the edges. I leave mine up in the garage so I don't deal with this issue, I did a slight modification and hung it from a couple chains so I could lift the screen up to a hook on the ceiling to get it out of the way completely. The stand is good though and its great fun to watch movies outdoors, like the "older" group of us that remember drive in theaters.
customer_reviews.author: Scacho

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a big display for the football season and to show movies indoors. The entire setup (stand & screen) are of excellent quality. It arrived with a few broken plastic screw in feet on the stand but the manufacturer sent replacements right away. Once you figure out how to set it up and take it down it doesn't take long to take it in and out of storage for use. The 110" was a perfect size when I use a projector from 12'-15' away.
customer_reviews.author: M Weber

customer_reviews.title: Flat screen and no wrinkles -- works great for a short throw projector
customer_reviews.text: This is a FANTASTIC screen and is what you need if you have a short throw projector -- the screen vinyl stretches very tightly across the frame so there are no wrinkles which could distort the projected image. All the aluminum components fold and un-fold easily and are of high quality. Worth the money invested in the screen. Goes up and comes down easily. Nice carrying case too.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great movie screen!!
customer_reviews.text: Great movie screen! We had a backyard movie night for our girls and it was perfect! I am so glad I picked this screen and not those inflatable ones. Less electrical cords, noise and/or risk of deflating. This screen is perfect. It is big enough for indoor or outdoor set ups.. I didn't need to secure it, it wasn't windy and stood up pretty firm during the whole movie time. We set it up in front of a chain-link fence. The images were still sharp and color perfect. Well, that depends of your projector too!!
customer_reviews.author: NOLA

customer_reviews.title: This screen worked great. The frame was amazingly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This screen worked great. The frame was amazingly easy to assemble. It's kinda ingenious how easy the screen unfolds. Feels really solid too. The screen snaps on really well, and with just one use so far, I had no problems with the snaps tearing away from the screen, which can be an issue with screens like this. The system comes with ropes, eye bolts and ground stakes to stabilize this thing but I haven't needed it so far. The wide legs were stable enough. And best of all it all fits back in the bag with no struggle! I use the two bag handles as backpack straps to easily haul it around.
customer_reviews.author: RonG

customer_reviews.title: I like the screen
customer_reviews.text: I like the screen, but it's not perfect. It's a real struggle to get the screen to snap into place. Each snap takes a fair amount of effort. I think it's designed this way to limit wrinkle in the screen. It forces you to really stretch each time. That's understandable, but it seems there should be an easier way to manage this. It also came damaged. I was tempted to return it, but due to it's size I decided to just keep it. One of the legs wouldn't fit without getting pliers to bend the metal. Once the screen is up and in place, it works great. The viewing area is large and the images look great on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sciple

customer_reviews.title: If your contemplating DIY vs buy one.....buy THIS one. Saves your time, not much more $
customer_reviews.text: I was going to build something similar from PVC pipe which would have taken a lot of time to plan/built and every time putting it up compared to this unit. Amazingly!!!! Literally folds/snaps in place from bag to ready in 6 minutes! Was worth the extra $ over a DIY job that would have been probably $75 in parts compared to the some $200 for this, easy setup, storage, and save my time......quit looking and buy this!
customer_reviews.author: klw

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Recently I helped a friend set up the large (CHEAP) screen she bought. It was a MAJOR PAIN! Full of wrinkles and unstable. The miserable experience taught me what features I did & didn't want. Did a ton of research before I bought this one. What a DIFFERENCE! This one slipped out of the bag and was set up in about 3 minutes. SUPER STABLE! Metal legs with beautiful, wrinkle free top quality screen. 20 rambunctious grandkids and NO worries!
customer_reviews.author: Firebrandrand

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly easy to set up. Very light and is easier to transport than my old style screen. There is a slightly visible crease horizontally across the screen - it is getting less noticable since I've had there screen up for awhile. I would suggest to have some way to secure the legs to the main frame. I have to do some creative leveling when I set it up outside, which is a bit more challenging when the legs fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Bryon F

customer_reviews.title: So far its been a great screen, very easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: So far its been a great screen, very easy to setup, looks great, the only issue I take with it is not being able to adjust the height, unlike many other fast fold screens there is no way to move the screen up or down a few inches. Would also be nice if a rear projection screen option was available. Still a great screen for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!  Easy Set up!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this screen for outdoor viewing of sporting events and movies on our back porch. The set up is super easy only takes about 10 minutes. Although, I needed my husband to stretch the screen the first few times because my hands weren't strong enough to pull the screen and snap it on the frame. We actually just took it down after being up for weeks due to the impending N'oreaster. I did buy sand bags to put over the legs of the frame to keep it more stable. I highly recommend this product. Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Rae Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great price for school use
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a great screen at a great price. We are going to use it for graduation and school functions in our gymnasium. My high school seniors were able to set it up and take it down with no trouble. Our maintenance director had researched the product for us and was very pleased to see it up yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Such a well made frame, great customer service, and it's huge for the price. Only complaint is that it takes a while for the creases in the screen to come out. They do get better, but they haven't gone away for me yet after a few months. Don't notice them much at all though when the screen is on, so overall this is still the best value and quality I could find. I use this indoors so I can't comment on its ability to withstand moving around and weather.
customer_reviews.author: someday

customer_reviews.title: Great screen for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This screen is of good quality. Collapsing frame and stand are well designed to fold down into a size for easy storage. Make sure you use the cardboard slats to protect the screen from getting dimples from the snaps when folding it up. Great, well engineered product. Kudos!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow...this screen is amazing. When i opened the box i said "how in the world did this fit in the bag. It was massive. I ordered the 120" and i was going to originally buy the 170" but thank goodness i didnt. It was perfect for my outdoor entertainment for me and my family. My husband did know how simple it was to put together and take apart until he saw me do it by myself.....he was so impressed. The family enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy for one person to set up
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy for one person to set up. I am very handy though. You need strong hands to stretch the screen onto the frame. Customer service was excellent addressing some minor issues. Don't worry about the fold marks on the screen. You can't see them at all when the image is projected on the screen, and they are very minor anyway. Others commented on them. I would not bother trying to removed them. They will just come back every time you put the screen away. I will probably but the 12 foot version. Bigger is better. This thing is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: G. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Great screen for the price A+++
customer_reviews.text: Was very surprised by the quality And size in the picture you see me standing by it I’m 6’1 screen is really big perfect for for any event as everyone else I was looking at reviews and researching best screens for the dollar and all I can say is this is a really great screen strong material very well made the frame is great it’s nice and sturdy I can’t wait to watch the next big Boxing match on it
customer_reviews.author: Raul Sainz

customer_reviews.title: Like having a drive in in you're backyard
customer_reviews.text: Huge. Awesome for screening movies by the pool. Bit concerned that the snaps that secure the screen to the frame will last. They are under a lot of lateral tension and I expect that at some point they will tear...but they haven't yet. Set up is amazingly fast compared to the competitors. Frame unfolds and locks in place vs. a bag of pipes you have to put together. Paired with a 1080P projector you have a portable theatre.
customer_reviews.author: crayz4life

customer_reviews.title: Tailgate party
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my birthday tailgate party and it did its job. We covered it with a tent so the picture can show better but I wish we could’ve found something that’s made to go over/behind it when the sun is out. We tried our best to have it in the shade tho
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice screen.
customer_reviews.text: This screen is fabulous. You won't be disappointed. It's easy to set up with only a few parts. The screen is vinyl and waterproof. Once attached the the frame there are no wrinkles. And it's nice and big for outside. We've used it by our pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tempfer

customer_reviews.title: I am satisified!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome projector 120' inch Screen! I was a bit weary to purchase this online with no projector experience, but after reeading the reviews and comparing it, I did it! I went out and bought an Epson 3D, HD, 1080HP and like whoa, this is a hit! Picture is so clear and awesome on this screen, it is huge and almost the size of my garage door!!! Kids and I are in lala land here at home in the garage thinking we are big shots with the Big Theatre look haha. Now I need to get me a good sound speaker to finish this up! Woohhoo!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: High-quality screen for backyard movie nights
customer_reviews.text: Love this screen. I bought it for movie nights in our back yard during the spring and summer. t's very easy to assemble. Takes one person about 10 minutes and it's solid when it's up and standing. It's a big screen, so on a windy day it could potentially blow over. But the supplied stakes have prevented that from happening. So no problems with the wind. It also comes with a black zip-up bag that makes it easy enough to carry, not too heavy. I evaluated many screens before deciding on this one, and I'm glad this is the one I bought. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn J

customer_reviews.title: Love this screen!
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent purchase. I bought it to replace an inflatable outdoor screen and i definitely prefer this screen to that one. The biggest reason is that it does not need to be tethered to a power cord. It is lightweight and was easy to put up. You can also detach the legs and just hang the screen from wherever you feel like watching a movie. I definitely plan on using it inside the house when outdoor movie season is over! The screen itself provides an excellent viewing surface. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal compared to others in this price range
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy duty and fantastic so far. The frame is all metal and sturdy. I got a different screen for about $20 cheaper and it was cheap thin plastic. This is 10 times better and so worth the money. Best deal under $100 anywhere online
customer_reviews.author: DKLJNB

customer_reviews.title: Attach top first!  Impressive design.
customer_reviews.text: The aircraft grade aluminum frame is amazing. Love the way it folds. The screen is very taught when installed. Make sure you attach the top first , stand the screen up and let gravity help you attach the bottom of the screen. Very impressive design.
customer_reviews.author: S.Chinnery

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen, a bit tricky to set up
customer_reviews.text: This screen is pretty much what we expected. It is very light which makes it easy to move around, especially since it's so large. The set-up, however, was a bit challenging. It requires you to snap the screen into place on the frame, but it took us two strong people to pull it tight enough to fit to the snaps. We eventually got it, but are worried about how long it would take to put it back up. If you are purchasing for an event, make sure you leave enough time allotted to assemble the screen. Otherwise, just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Meg G.

customer_reviews.title: We love this movie screen
customer_reviews.text: We love this movie screen. Incredibly easy to set up and HD movies are crystal clear. One word of caution is to make sure you screw in the eye bolts at the top and use the guy-lines to hold it down. The frame is aluminum and this thing blows over pretty easily - DO NOT just drop sand bags on the feet... use the guy-lines! I forgot to use them and was too lazy to simply tip the thing over and set it up properly, so I just dropped sand bags on the feet. the wind blew it over and broke a leg... LUCKILY, the manufacturer site sells replacements. Overall GREAT product! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: William C. Arent

customer_reviews.title: Best Screen Ever.!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg.!!! Luxury screen. I was afraid I made a mistake buying this screen at first. I read the 1 star review and immediately researched how to return. Knowing how to return this thing if it was a flop the package arrived. My son and I set up the screen and decided to mount it in the living room after seeing how nice it was. Washable material has a luxury feel and the frame is sturdy.!! They even included mounting brackets.!!! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to setup and take down. Recommend two person job based on the size of the screen. Loops at top of screen do not support hanging the screen. The loops started to tear away screen after two uses while hanging it from loops. The screen was mounted indoors so wind causing the screen was not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. The aluminum frame is well built and rugged. The screen is easy to install. What little there is in wrinkles are hardly noticeable when in use. When left up for a a week they pretty much disappeared. Everything folds away easily, too.
customer_reviews.author: Meesa

customer_reviews.title: Still in perfect condition 5 years later!
customer_reviews.text: We use this movie screen all year long. In the winter - we need to bring inside to warm up the screen so we can stretch it to fit. After 5 years it is still tear-free and works great! Great screen for home use. Easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Momma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2016. Great quality. I definitely recommend. I forgot mine outside and it was windy, rainy, one of the legs bent really bad, I now need to figure out who to contact for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Sees

customer_reviews.title: Great screen, cheap stand!
customer_reviews.text: Update: The company saw my review and without me asking sent me another stand immediately. Therefore, due to excellent customer service, I changed my rating to 5 star. Thanks! I loved the screen, but the stand was cheaply made. I had it up in an open space for about 2 hours in approximately 8 mph wind and it crumbled. It broke the stand and I can't find a replacement for it. It appears I must repurchase the entire kit (stand & screen).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super screen...
customer_reviews.text: Love the screen. It's really easy to assemble and stores away nicely. Bag makes it very convenient to carry and use outdoors. Very light weight. We used it for a movie night at the park and my young children were able to carry it up the hill, assemble it, and pack it back away with no problem. The only thing was we had to wait until it got really dark to see the movie, (which may have been the projector). We have used it in our backyard, in our playroom, at the pool, every where we can think of watching a movie on a big screen and it has worked out wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gray

customer_reviews.title: After wrong legs replaced, good product
customer_reviews.text: After some challenges —difficulty stretching the fabric to the frame and receiving the wrong set of legs—everything worked fine. We were up against a tight deadline and the manufacturer offered (as they should have) to replace the legs and did. We had to pay $40 to expedite shipping but it was worth it in the end. The screen is hard to mount for one person. Much easier with two or more. The 144-inch was just right and images looked good.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi G.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for watching football games and movies outdoors. It has been great. Many people complain about the tight fit of the screen but if you do the four corners first it goes on easily. Picture quality has been great using the Optoma DW326e WXGA 3000 Lumen Full 3D DLP Projector with HDMI. I also bought the Apex Digital ASB-800 40" HD Sound Home Theater Soundbar that I hook to the front of the screen. So, with the screen, projector, soundbar, and cables I have spent $735.00. One rental of an outdoor movie setup is $350.00 in our area. I've already used it three times so I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen For the Money
customer_reviews.text: So far its been great. Using an Optoma HD143X. Had this up and down about 4 times already. No problems except one. As others have stated there is one crease that is visible through the center. Not horrible and for the price it is more than acceptable. Hoping that it fades once I get it out into the sun. Sa far I've only had it up in the house. Have not tried 3D on it yet, but I plan on doing so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R Celona

customer_reviews.title: This is a great screen and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a great screen and easy to assemble. It snaps onto the frame and believe me the screen does not that elastic. This is a good thing so that your screen doesn't loosen but a bit a hassle if you don't have it setup permanently. It can get hard to snap together because you need to pull it taut, can be murder on your thumbs. We have setup this screen about 6 times now and it's still as hard to snap, which is a good thing since you don't want it loose but be prepared for it to make your thumbs sore. We got the 120" and it's a great picture size perfect for outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We set this up the night before we were going to use it and it got rained on but luckily the water wiped right off. While setting it up, my 100 pound lab started to walk across it but it survived without a scratch. It folds down and comes with its own bag. My only concern is that the screen snaps onto the base and it looks like the snaps could easily rip apart if your not extremely careful. I've only used it once so far and the snaps survived. The movie looked great on this screen. I bought the smallest screen but it was very large.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two spoiled girls

customer_reviews.title: Good product but questionable customer service
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to set up if you follow their instructions. It installs by laying the frame on the floor and snapping the screen onto the frame in the same manner as installing a tonneau cover. However, the one I received had one crushed snap on the frame and so that one was unusable. I called the manufacturer for a replacement and they promised to send a replacement snap. It has been 2 months and nothing happened. I guess I'm on my own on that. Regardless, it is still a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nevada Geezer

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This thing is built like a tank! I'm glad I finally opted for the real deal - I tried purchasing a similar screen but it essentially fell apart upon my first set uo. This one however feels plenty sturdy and the quality control is on point and feels new. I'll be testing this out throughly as the wedding season gets into full swing.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha NinjaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a big boy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Love it. Put up by myself. Light and strong. Great for indoor or out. Not as big as the jumbo inflatables, but looks much nicer. Hope it lasts a while. Used twice, no issues. Get the skirt too. Adds the theater effect.
customer_reviews.author: elderjay

customer_reviews.title: Lite and easy
customer_reviews.text: I have read that the screen comes with a crease, but it was unnoticeable the first time I used it. If you lay it out in the sun for a ten or so minutes before you put it on the frame, it is easier to button on. The eye hooks on the top are handy for tie downs or hanging. Just be sure to place in a location with little wind, I am not sure how well the legs would hold up. The entire assembly in the case is lite weight and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: James Heinrichs

customer_reviews.title: NOT SO EASY_QUALITY JUST OK
customer_reviews.text: The frame part is awesome! The screen...not so much. It connects with snaps and the screen much smaller than the frame so you really have to stretch it to snap the screen to the frame.....1. I was missing a snap on the screen from the start....poor quality control. 2. The screen had to be stretched so much it starts to tear the snaps from the screen. Screen is more like quality plastic, picture from our projector was nice but be sure to have high powered projector thats where the real picture quality comes from.
customer_reviews.author: george Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable screen for the money. Go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice screen. Well designed. Great picture. It's a bit heavy for me (typical 5'7" 50 y.o. woman) to carry in its case but not imppssible and once I figured it out (which isn't rocket science) I can put it up entirely by myself. Be sure to tie it down REALLY well so it won't blow over. I didn't one time and it hit the ground and bent the stakes. I bent them back but still may need to buy replacements. This was my fault though so the product still gets 5 stars because the screen and frame survived the tumble entirely intact!
customer_reviews.author: MLS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect indoor or outdoor movie screen.
customer_reviews.text: The screen and the supports that came with it, all arrived in perfect condition. I got the 120 inch screen and it fits perfectly inside our house with a 9 foot ceiling. I am shooting from 13 and half feet back for a 120 inch picture. I am paring the screen with an Optoma HD29 Darbee. Gaming and movies have been simply wonderful. Set up and take down have been simple to handle as well. Just be sure to use care when fastening or unfastening the snaps as not to tear the screen or damage the snaps.
customer_reviews.author: D. Suggett

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again, but don't like the creases
customer_reviews.text: Awesome screen. We haven't tried it outside yet, so I don't know how well it works tied down in the wind. We struggle with taking it apart because folding the screen causes creases and that's how it comes to you. We prefer to roll it. This is difficult because you have to have a large, clean surface or lots of helping hands. Then, it doesn't have a storage sleeve that fits it, so you're required to fold it at least down the middle before rolling.
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: Dont hesitatew
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy and easy to put up. I did it by myself in less that 15 minutes straight out of the box. Be careful with your fingers the corners are easy to get your skin pinched in. Also even with the tie anchors I had to use cinder blocks to weigh the screen down but in fairness it was a windy day...stayed up during my event, was down by the next morning tho. Carrying case is very practical and uses a small footprint for storage. Still a great product for the cost
customer_reviews.author: A Bangura

customer_reviews.title: Great projection screen!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about the others but my screen arrived just as expect. It was easy setting up alone! The legs fit perfectly and screen snapped on just fine. It's tight but tight for a reason. With careful movements, you can still snap them on. It came with everything and as long as you stake everything down and strap it down right to prevent wind movement and movement in general, it'll be rock solid for movies and whatever. Great product! I can't complain. 5 stars! Fast shipping as well!
customer_reviews.author: My Quoc Tran

customer_reviews.title: Love this screen
customer_reviews.text: The screen is awesome. You can set it up super quick and take it down super quick. It's also super durable I left it up for about 3 weeks where we had multiple storms high winds. It was not affected at all. Picture is great too much better than the white tarp I was using previously.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R.

customer_reviews.title: You want some outdoor summer entertainment - get this screen!
customer_reviews.text: I am SERIOUSLY impressed by this screen. I've bought many hundreds of items on Amazon and rarely leave reviews. This product deserves one as does the company that sells it AND SUPPORTS the product (see seller review). I bought it for my daughter's birthday party and was immediately impressed with the design, quality and instructions. Rare these days I am afraid to say. Dead easy to set up and start using. The picture quality is amazing also - I don;t have super expensive projector, but the images are crisp and bright. I can't imagine anyone disappointed with this screen. It is such fun!
customer_reviews.author: Morris Burch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my display of videos
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in front of house that completely covered two front windows so I may project videos during my Halloween haunt. Had difficulty with some metal components, but finally got them to connect. Had to adjust straps to get screen taunt on frame. A good investment that I will use for many years.
customer_reviews.author: John Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great but too big to carry it around
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and projector however I don’t see myself carry it around for the purpose that I bought it for. If you are planning to leave it in one place permanently I think it’s a perfect projector.
customer_reviews.author: Z-Z

customer_reviews.title: Screen IS plastic, but so far it is very heavy duty and no wrinkles once setup. Metal frame is easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: The screen is great and the frame is very easy to standup and take back down once you figure it out. My only issue, and ONLY reason I gave it 4 stars and not 5 is the screen edges are plastic, and not a fabric, so I am concerned that the snap on buttons they use will eventually break off. They are pulled VERY tightly (which is great no wrinkles) but with it being plastic that is my only concern. Besides that, this thing in GREAT so far, and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: BobOki

customer_reviews.title: delivered as promised
customer_reviews.text: The story on the this screen is that is was easy to set up, it is sturdy, and the screen is high quality for good projection picture. It delivers on all accounts. I used it outside on a cool night with dew and a slight breeze... no issues at all. Note: the first time you put the screen on the frame you will need to stretch it a bit. So, get your muscles warmed up. This is good though. A tight fit makes the screen taut for a great picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Harris

customer_reviews.title: A very high-quality product
customer_reviews.text: Our only concern -- and it's a minor one -- is that the nylon carrying bag has a fairly limited lifespan. The aluminum edges are naturally quite sharp, and they eventually begin to cut through the bag. In the company's defense, most buyer's probably won't be traumatized by this problem, and the solution would be a costly bag-quality upgrade by Vapex that would be lost on most.
customer_reviews.author: SpiralPeter

customer_reviews.title: Simple to Set Up, Large Screen Assy Folds to Compact Size
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these because we do large conferences. We are very pleased. They are easy to set up and take down, have a nice screen, and fold very compactly, especially considering the large screen size. We use them successfully with the very bright with Epson PowerLite Home Cinema 1440 projectors.
customer_reviews.author: OutaSpace

customer_reviews.title: Great screen!
customer_reviews.text: This screen is a great size for outdoor movie nights. The best feature, however, is how relatively easy it is to put up and take down. Unfolds easily, snaps on legs easily, and screen snaps on easily. Do need to be sure to use tie-downs (included) if using free-standing as even a slight wind makes it act like a sail due to it's sizzle. We also found placing it parallel to the direction of the wind also helps. Take down and fold up was rather easy as well. Did use two people to put up and take down just due to the size. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Quality screen
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I don't LOVE this is because they don't include a sheet or something to store the screen in. I'm just using a flat bed sheet. The instructions say it needs something so why isn't it just included?!? Otherwise, this is a great product. So easy to set up. Stores in bag very well and screen has it's own separate bag that is good quality. Pretty portable. Good quality picture, but I'm sure that depends on quality of projector. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never got it assembled....screen will not fit on frame
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this product as while the screen itself appears to be useable, the overall assembly process is horrible. The screen sent to me was about 8" to narrow to fit the frame provided and the snaps were WAY off. Poor quality control.... Avoid this product....there are better options!
customer_reviews.author: 1%InFill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup, quality screen and stand
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together in about 10 minutes. The only help he needed from me was standing it up. Very happy with the quality of the canvas and the stand. Nice carrying bag as well. We have it up and are working on the projector now. We can see moving it around our deck to different places depending on usage, and also easily putting it away when we don’t. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Treese

customer_reviews.title: but I am so happy with this screen that I’m leaving my own review ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have much to add to what other customers have said, but I am so happy with this screen that I’m leaving my own review anyway. I have a studio apartment and the 120 inch screen fits perfectly. The two sizes bigger must be even more incredible. I barely had to look at any instructions out of the box, and with the help of a friend, I had it up in 15 minutes. It’s taking less time as I get used to it, even when doing it alone, which gets better with practice. The creases may still be visible after full assembly, but completely unnoticeable during projection. The carrying case is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pat McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Great screen for schools and community centers!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-built screen that I could see working very well with small institutions (community centers and the like) or schools. Unfortunately we had to return it after assembling it and using it a few times because it is too large for our house. I would recommend this to anyone that needs a pretty durable portable screen that bridges the gap between a smaller, tripod style screen and a screen you'd find in a movie theater.
customer_reviews.author: Mikelena

customer_reviews.title: Oh.....YEAH!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I set it up in my den to see how it looks and make sure I like it before I take it outdoors. Yeah, it's still there after 2 months, we love it! It almost takes up the entire 12' wall in front of the fireplace. Got a mini projector as well from an outside vendor and just brought me a 25ft HDMI. Oh yeah! That line that everyone keeps referring to in the reviews, well, I haven't noticed it. But then again, I am in my house away from natural like, so it make behave differently. Televisions are so tiny and expensive! Go big! Get a Projector screen!
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great screen that we ordered for our new community center
customer_reviews.text: Great screen that we ordered for our new community center. It was exactly what we needed with super easy set up as well as great size and price for the amazing quality we received. We wanted the screen to be easily set up and taken down if needed. It comes in a great bag as well with makes transport easy and manageable for one person.
customer_reviews.author: Tseef87

customer_reviews.title: The quality was phenomenal no noisy fan noise like a inflatable screen an compact to boot
customer_reviews.text: Finally set this up. It's a breeze. The quality was phenomenal no noisy fan noise like a inflatable screen an compact to boot. Take down is a snap and the picture quality incredible. I have to say that this company is also fantastic. I was quite disappointed when after 2 uses, our screen developed a noticeable black mark in the upper right corner. I contact the company to express my concern and displeasure. They immediately emailed me and are shipping a replacement screen. In a market full of disposable products, you won't find customer service as great as that. Buy this screen, it won't dissapoint.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great price  for 144”  fast fold screen
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Two years ago. Screen pice was good and screen picture excellent. You can’t expect a heavy duty frame for the low price. Over all a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SCREEN TOO SMALL FOR FRAME!
customer_reviews.text: SCREEN TOO SMALL FOR FRAME! The screen did not stretch enough to hit all the snaps.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Feedback Freddie

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome set up takes literally minutes to put together and ...
customer_reviews.text: My home movie viewing has become unreal. What an awesome set up takes literally minutes to put together and take apart . Easy to move around and the experience of watching movies outside is fantastic . My family loves sitting outside on a warm evening enjoying the entertainment. The mobile storage bag that comes with it is perfect for packing up and traveling. Don't worry about the creases once you unfold has little to know effect. After awhile they begin to disappear. Also comes with metal stakes to secure to ground outside of wind becomes a problem . Once again love this product worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: pedro gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality
customer_reviews.text: This screen is fantastically built, hard core, solid, and stable. We are now the coolest kids on the block (except when we watched Game of Thrones, and the 11 year old girl next door was watching it out her 2nd story window... we had a little scolding from the mom next door. Sorry Mom, won't happen again.) The snaps that hold the vinyl to the frame are easy to attach, but (because they are heavy duty) can be a bit difficult to remove - I purchased a snap removal tool ( and it now is effortless to take down.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Love this screen
customer_reviews.text: Love this screen... I tend to set it up without the legs then hang it where I need it. Without the legs I can usually have it setup and in place within 10 minutes. Take down is also pretty much a breeze. On a related note, a prior screen (another brand) that I bought had a horrible smell to it. This screen is large and odorless; believe it or not that is a big plus as I hate strange odors. I realize that it shouldn't matter for an outdoor screen but I hang mine indoors more often than I do outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: R. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: Good, not great. Does not assemble or disassemble easily. Would be excellent for indoor use, but does not do well outside except with lots of ballast and considerable set-up time. Good luck if it begins to rain and you need to get it down quickly. When set up, the screen and functionality is excellent. You need to be fore-warned as to the multi-person requirements of getting it up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Leather1905

customer_reviews.title: Just Like the Drive-In
customer_reviews.text: OMG we just love this portable screen. We purchased for movie night with our friends and family. It’s so easy to put together as well as take apart and store. The screen is super huge just like being at the movies! Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Bruning

customer_reviews.title: 144" outdoor screen in minutes
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Fold up frame and the snap buttons make setup very easy. Seemed a little frail until the frame is locked. The design is very simple but sturdy. overall weight for a screen this size is great. Picture looks great on this screen and the screen is waterproof. Cons: Screen fabric needs to be stretched very tight and worried me at some times just how much needed to be pulled at the button snaps. I have only tested it once so i'll need to review after a season of taking up and down.
customer_reviews.author: rudynelson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, and AMAZING customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Great quality. Great picture. I recently ordered the ProjectoScreen 132HD portable screen. The screen was delivered by the promised delivery date. Shortly after delivery I noticed a small issue with the screen. I contacted the company. Without wasting any time, they immediately sent me a replacement screen. I am beyond satisfied with the service I received. It's easy to find a good product, but rare to find a company that delivers such a great quality product, and even better service. I highly recommend this company and their products to everyone! They definitely earned my business. I will buy from them again without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size for showing in our church sanctuary that seats about 300. It also will work well for our conference room for education. It is good quality, has a very fine travel case, and should be useful for many years to come. It has brackets to install on a wall for more permanent usage, without the feet. There are many options for use indoor and outdoor. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: We are the envy of the neighborhood with this screen!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this screen. We've become the envy of the neighborhood during our weekend movie nights. It's easy to set up and stores nicely in a bag, although you'd never know it by looking at it. If this is something you are interested in, do not hesitate. Watch the videos that show how easy it is to set up and take down. I do not regret purchasing this screen at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Two Boys

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love the screens I have been working in the AV business for 30+ years and was looking to replace my 4x3 screens with HD ones. I saw this product and decided to buy it based on the price and some reviews. I liked the first one so much I have bought 4 more with extensions legs rear fabrics and skirts for 2. High quality equipment easy to use and much lighter than my old fast fold.
customer_reviews.author: mike smith

customer_reviews.title: Buttons?!
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these already. I run a small AV company and rely on lower priced AV equipment to keep my prices lower than the competition. Out of the 6 of these I already have this was the 3rd one that had issues with the buttons either not lining up or just being non-existent. The ones that aren’t defective are perfect for my needs, but unfortunately I purchased the last 2 for an event that I’m now forced to give $1000 back to the client. I. Am. Pissed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Barrale

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, great projection surface, time will tell if vinyl will stand up to repeated use
customer_reviews.text: So far, this screen has worked wonderfully. I can set the entire thing up by myself, and following the instructions to snap the vinyl screen onto the metal frame, I can get the entire thing up and staked in about 15-20 minutes. I have noticed some pulling out of the vinyl from behind the corner grommets and hope this doesn't eventually rip over time. Not sure if this is normal wear and tear or a defect, but you do have to pull the screen quite tight to get it to stretch and snap correctly across the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Harris

customer_reviews.title: Screen Tears Easily
customer_reviews.text: When we first assembled the screen, the screen was very tight. After about 10 uses a few of the snap buttons started to tear. Within 15 uses nearly half of the snap buttons are now torn and has rendered the screen unusable. It worked great but but just simply didn't last. I have also tried to contact customer support and have received no response or help. Really disappointed in the quality and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice product. pretty huge
customer_reviews.text: nice product. pretty huge. we used in for a backyard party. people were impressed on this size of this. I can easily put in up with one person. tie this monster down if the wind is blowing, i had it blow over and land on the bbq grill but didn't hurt it. The screen does have creases in it due to be folded up there is no way around that but you don't even notice it when your watching it.
customer_reviews.author: richard black

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor movies
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice screen for outdoors during the summer. It folds up nice and neat and comes with a carrying bag. It is recommended to be assembled and disassembled with two people. One word of advice is to make sure that you put it up when it's not windy. It's also advisable that you use some sort of anchor to keep it from swinging during Highwinds. I use sandbags to keep it sturdy. Screen display is nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Dinesh Dyal

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade your summer
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price and quality from apex, screen is amazing compared to other outdoor screens I’ve had snaps in and the seams from being folded go away in an hour of being stretched out. Multiple mounting options as well. The frame is light weight and easy to move around and put back in the case it came with. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M.

customer_reviews.title: This is the Screen You Want to Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, Easy to assemble, use, and disassemble. The product comes well packaged and with good instructions. When taken down it fits in a well-made 41" pouch which holds the sturdy aluminum frame and the screen fabric. If you ever damage the screen fabric, replacements are available at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: BlancoCooper

customer_reviews.title: it's working great. Set was way easier than what I was ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, it's working great. Set was way easier than what I was expecting. I was able to do it just by myself in may be 15 mins. I was expecting some work setting up the frame, but turned out to be the easiest part. Anyway, the screen hardly has any wrinkles now and the picture look much better than my home-made cloth screen with wrinkles which I was using earlier. Only thing I wish it had is a height adjustable stand
customer_reviews.author: munky

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and already tearing
customer_reviews.text: The screen is already tearing and I have only used it twice. We bought this to use during business presentations. In my opinion this screen is not very durable and is not made to be moved. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: shlakris

product_meta.title: Visual Apex Projector Screen 120HD Portable Indoor/Outdoor Movie Theater Fast-Folding Projector Screen with Stand Legs and Carry Bag HD4K 16:9 format
product_meta.description:
120" portable projector screen 16:9 format 1-piece-fast-fold frame. Easy set up in minutes. No frame assembly required, extend and snap into place. Material snaps onto frame easily, with a tight fit.
View size: 120" diagonal, 104"w x 59"h. Overall size (with Legs attached) 112"w x 93.5"h. Legs are 26.5”h and detachable providing extra flexibility for hanging applications - 2 wall mounts are included.
Screen Material: Cinema Matte White 1.1 Gain, 4K Ultra HD, 2D and 3D Projection Ready. 160 degree viewing angle with black backing for front projection screen.
Everything is included - Screen material, frame, sturdy carry bag, ground stakes can be placed through frame feet and guide ropes are included to provide extra stability. Hanging grommets included for hanging applications. In addition – 2 wall mounts are provided for flat wall mount hanging applications.
2-year manufacturer warranty. ROHS standard approved.
feature_bullets: 120” 1-piece-fast-fold frame. Easy set up in minutes! No frame assembly required. Material snaps onto frame with a tight fit to avoid wrinkles.
View size: 120" diagonal, 104"w x 59"h. Overall size (with Legs attached) 112"w x 93.5"h. Legs are 26.5”h and detachable for hanging applications - 2 wall mounts are included!
PVC Screen Material: Cinema Matte White 1.1 Gain, 4K Ultra HD, 2D and 3D with black backing.
Included - sturdy carry bag, stakes to place through frame feet and guide ropes to provide extra stability. Hanging grommets to hang screen and 2 wall mounts are provided to wall mount hang.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,228 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
